programma:
Parte I - Software Testing 

Introduzione al software testing 
Static & Dynamic white box testing 
Data based black box testing 
Performance testing
Test Tools Open Source

Parte II - Tecnologie Java per lo sviluppo di applicazioni web-based

Architetture e tecnologie Java EE 
Framework Open Source

Parte III - Seminari su temi specifici 

Project Management
Configuration & Build Management
testiRiferimento:
Software Testing? by Ron Patton, Sams Publishing (2005). 

?The Art of Software Testing? (second edition) by Glenford J. Myers et. al., John Wiley & Sons, Inc. (2004).
